name: ravn-ai-toolkit

skills.name: tech-vitest
skills.description: Vitest-specific testing utilities — vi.mock, vi.fn, fake timers, MSW.

skills.name: design-frontend
skills.description: Visual design system patterns for web UIs — layout, responsive, Tailwind tokens.

skills.name: design-accessibility
skills.description: WCAG AA and ARIA best practices — screen readers, keyboard navigation, focus management.

skills.name: liquid-glass-ios
skills.description: Apple's Liquid Glass design system for iOS 26+ and iPadOS 26+.

skills.name: swift-concurrency
